author: dgraham
msg: Change mode to cvs keyword substitution.

author: dgraham
msg: Replaced MapperFactory.initMapper() with a much more flexible event system.
Now Mapper implementations can be mixed without the need for complicated
factories to initialize all the various kinds of Mappers.  Clients create one
MapperFactory instance and register listeners to do the Mapper initialization.
Listeners that don't know how to handle a type of Mapper implementation
